name: Principality of Wallachia
startIntroPart1: Long ago, we were ruled by traitors, but since the rise of our great Vlad III, we have won our honor and faith against our enemies!
startIntroPart2: We will go all out for glory and victory on our journey with the great Vlad III.
declaringWar: You disrespected God! and disrespected me, prepare to war!
defeated: Oh no! thats is not happening! my glory! my faith! what's happened here!?
introduction: We are Wallachians! God bless you. you have some faith in us God?
hateHello: I dont wanna talk with you.
hateNo: I said and continous saying, NO!
afterPeace: I dont wanna peace but, this war is starting became interesthing
uniques: Cities are razed [2] times as fast
Gain a free [Cathedral] [in all cities] <after discovering [Theology]>

name: Kongo Kingdom
startIntroPart1: With great faith and commerce, we, the Kingdom of Kongo, strengthened with our great majesty Alfonso I.
startIntroPart2: With our faith in our God, we will go to triumph and glory even with many challenges to face. We will not give up on our path.
declaringWar: In Jesus name! you will fall!
attacked: You dont have mercy! I will dont have too!
defeated: You just think in gold and glory for yourself! you stupid ambicious will destroy you in one day!
introduction: Salutations brother! in the God name, us we became big friends
tradeRequest: Faith brother, you will accept my offer?
uniques: Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
